mapper.insert: insert into shang_grainandoil ( userId, numberOfChecks, commodityName, brand, placeOfOrigin, specifications,price,priceEffectiveStart,priceEffectiveEnd,remarks, pictureUrl,isReceivingPurchase,permissionid,commoditytype,approval_status, approval_failure,createTime,updateTime ) values ( #{userId}, #{numberOfChecks}, #{commodityName}, #{brand}, #{placeOfOrigin}, #{specifications}, #{price},#{priceEffectiveStart},#{priceEffectiveEnd},#{remarks}, #{pictureUrl},#{isReceivingPurchase},#{permissionid},#{commoditytype},#{approval_status}, #{approval_failure},#{createTime},#{updateTime} )
